document.full_text: former world number two sergio garcia carded a second bogey-free round in a row to stay in the hunt for victory at the halfway stage of the china open on friday.
document.title: sergio garcia stays in hunt to end trophy drought
lines_and_colors: former world number two sergio garcia carded a second bogey-free round in a row to stay in the hunt for victory at the halfway stage of the china open on friday.
